data.fullContent: Repairing a leaking faucet is not as complicated as many people assume. Once you determine the source of the leak, shut off the water supply. Remove each component and check for wear, degraded parts, or blockage. Replace any broken parts and then put the faucet back together.
data.answer: 修理漏水的水龙头并不像许多人想象的那么复杂。一旦你确定了泄漏的来源，就关闭水的供应。拆卸每个部件，检查是否有磨损、退化部件或堵塞。更换坏掉的部件，然后再把水龙头装回去。
